short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sidebar to assist in OSINT investigations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Conducting online investigations often requires a whole lot of context switching. The EZR OSINT sidebar allows you to conduct analysis and document important information without ever having to leave your browser or switch tabs.

Here is some of the information we currently extract:
> Images (EXIF Tags, SHA-256 Hash, Reverse Image Search)
> Emails (Web Search, Matching Usernames, Google Account Detection)
> Phone Numbers (Location, Web Search) 
> Bitcoin Addresses (Web Search, Transactions, Balance)
> Online Accounts (Matching usernames, Web Search)
> IP Addresses (Geolocation, Operator Information)

The EZR sidebar also makes it easy to document your investigations with:
> Screen Recording 
> Screenshots (Scrolling, Tab, Selection, and Full Desktop) 
> MHTML Download
> Built-in Notepad with export to DOCX

Get updates and tutorials at our YouTube Channel:
https://www.youtube.com/@EZRIntelligence
